test-case.name: addModuleToAssignedDistributionSetTypeFails
test-case.description: Tests the unsuccessfull update of used distribution set type (module addition).

test-case.name: createAndUpdateDistributionSetWithInvalidFields
test-case.description: Verify that a DistributionSet with invalid properties cannot be created or updated

test-case.name: deleteAssignedDistributionSetType
test-case.description: Tests the successfull deletion of used (soft delete) distribution set types.

test-case.name: entityQueriesReferringToNotExistingEntitiesThrowsException
test-case.description: Verifies that management queries react as specfied on calls for non existing entities by means of throwing EntityNotFoundException.

test-case.name: removeModuleToAssignedDistributionSetTypeFails
test-case.description: Tests the unsuccessfull update of used distribution set type (module removal).

test-case.name: deleteUnassignedDistributionSetType
test-case.description: Tests the successfull deletion of unused (hard delete) distribution set types.

test-case.name: updateUnassignedDistributionSetTypeModules
test-case.description: Tests the successfull module update of unused distribution set type which is in fact allowed.

test-case.name: updateAssignedDistributionSetTypeMetaData
test-case.description: Tests the successfull update of used distribution set type meta data which is in fact allowed.

test-case.name: nonExistingEntityAccessReturnsNotPresent
test-case.description: Verifies that management get access react as specfied on calls for non existing entities by means of Optional not present.
